Requirements You're wielding a gun.

You fire a single trick shot that passes through multiple foes. Make a ranged Strike with your gun against a target within your first range increment. Apply this attack against all creatures in a straight line between you and your target. This attack ignores any lesser cover the targets would provide one another. Roll damage only once, and apply it to each creature you hit. Line 'Em Up counts as two attacks for your multiple attack penalty.
